other_tests.findings: Vesicular dermatitis with epidermal acantholysis, ulceration, and multinucleated keratinocytes, indicative of viral inclusions.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The nature of the underlying dermatosis could not be firmly established as either atopic dermatitis or psoriasis.

other_tests.date: On the third day of admission
other_tests.findings: Mild regular acanthosis, hyperkeratosis, and diminution of the granular-cell layer, consistent with psoriasis.
